official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to display a yellow ribbon around the Statue of Liberty in honor of the members of United States Armed Forces who served in the Persian Gulf War.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to procure and display a yellow ribbon of appropriate design around the Statue of Liberty at the Statue of Liberty National Monument beginning within 60 days after appropriated funds are available, in honor of the members of the U.S. armed forces who served in the Persian Gulf War.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to display a yellow ribbon around the Statue of Liberty in honor of the members of United States Armed Forces who served in the Persian Gulf War.
